data.title: Hyper-Noise Aesthetics
data.meta_description: 6 posts published by josephnechvatal during August 2013
data.text:

The Viractuality of Post-Conceptual Art the birth Of the viractual, 2001, 70×70”, computer-robotic assisted acrylic on canvas (c) Joseph Nechvvatal Post-conceptual art is that contemporary art that builds upon the legacy of Conceptual Art, where the concept(s) or idea(s) … Continue reading →

An Interview with Joseph Nechvatal posted at http://versejunkies.com/?p=6110 on 10 Aug 2013 by versejunkies In the introduction to the book Selected Essays 1981-2001 by Peter Halley, Richard Milazzo describes Joseph Nechvatal’s theoretic output as a systematic onslaught of critical theory. Information is not Wisdom (1986) is my 14×11″ drawing on view at the Into the Light: The Las Vegas Art Museum Collection Emerges show. It is in the collection of UNLV Marjorie Barrick Museum in Las Vegas. The drawing came … Continue reading →
